entry.title: Thursday night: Blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 31 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 31 this evening then steady. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
